flawed_nl_solution:
If Bob goes along the side that's 120 feet long, he will till 110 / 2 = 55 rows.
Each of these rows are 120 feet long, so he will push the tiller a total of 120 * 55 = <<120*55=6060>>6060 feet.
He tills 1 linear foot of ground every 2 seconds, so it will take him 2 * 6060 = 12120 seconds to till this plot
12120 seconds is 12120 / 60 = <<12120/60=202>>202 minutes
#### 202

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6600, not 6060. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
